main.name: Renuka Schreck
intro: üëã I am Renuka Schreck, software developer and a meta-fit instructor üí™. I am Interested in a challenging position as a JavaScript full-stack developer.

I was born in Jabalpur, India. I have 5 older sisters. After graduating High School, I went to Nutan college for Bachelor's degree in Math and then went to MANIT for MCA (Master's In Computer Application). I move to US in 2000 and instead of going to University again, I decided to focus on Certifications and passed two Microsoft certifications.
My keen interest in programming and design helps me find creative solutions to technical challenges from back-end to front-end and develop solutions. I am writing code for more than 2 decades.
I live in Austin, TX üè† with my hubby Dan and Charlie the üêï. Our daughter Reva is studying electrical engineering from UTSA.

I used to be a Microsoft full-stack developer with expertise in C#, ASP.NET, MVC, WPF most of my professional life but few years back, I learned JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node, GraphQL, AWS and now very comfortable as JS/TS full-stack developer. I have also done a small course on Python
moreIntro: 11 years back, I started simple exercises like Zumba, then I started doing meta-fit (HITT). Later I became meta-fit instructor. Last year, I ran my first half-marathon.
I am a vegetarian who loves to cook. I also love my üç∑. I also enjoy long walks with my hubby.
